title: uche6215
author: uche6215
content: Like my grandma once said,  your closest friends are your worse antagonist. Here comes a former security guard who was incarcerated for selling the most hidden secret to Russiahttps://www.scotsman.com/news/world/scottish-security-guard-david-ballantyne-smith-jailed-for-13-years-for-russia-spying-at-british-embassy-in-berlin-4031272  That's why here in this world we don't have to trust anyone.
